page.title: 04Glenturk
page.content: Glenturk is a farm situated to the north-west of Wigtown. The farm covers 300 acres of land, and is owned by Mr. W.S.Allan. The type of{farming} specialised in is that of breeding { {pedigree livestock}. Mr. Allan has 200 head of cattle, and he also has some pedigree sheep. Glenturk breeds Galloway cattle and {exports}some of the cattle to Germany, Russia, Canada, South Africa and Kenya. He imports simmiental cattle from Germany. Mr. Allan first imported these in 1970. The importing and the exporting of the cattle proves that cattle from other parts of the world can do well in this country, and that cattle from here can do well abroad.
